name: TatMan
description:
TatMan is remake of popular game PacMan with new mechanics as a roguelike action, invisibility. TatMan has 3 brothers who became his most sworn enemies. So take the side of good and defeat your brothers! Game was made for PGD Gamejam #3. Game does not contain that much of content as we wanted at the beginning. 

WASD - Movement (Tap, not press)
E - Invisibility (Restores in 15 seconds)
TAB - Hide tutorial

Collect all dots in rooms to clear the stage. Large dots could give you PowerUps or Score Points. Kill all 3 bosses and go to the portal to finish the game. Good luck :)

Discord: https://discord.gg/vBjc33ZY8C

Instagram: @untralizestudio
